reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater looks expensive and appreciate its great sleeve length, soft material, and high-quality construction. Customers have mixed opinions about the material thickness, with some finding it too thin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and comfy
items.body: Absolutely love this sweater! It‚Äôs very comfortable and soft. It has the wonderful white piping to access the sweater. Classy look.The length of the sweater is great considering I‚Äôm a tall lady, 5‚Äô10. Read more
items.author: Julie A. Smith

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love ittt ‚ô°
items.body: Yesss! This is a good one. Thin yet warm and bit see thru. Comfy af!!! Super duper cute and the piping brings the eye in and imo its very flattering and slimming. So stretchy. So the person who said the neck was tight just doesnt like turtlenecks in general because just a tug keeps mine off my neck üòÜ so so soft. Size is great. Got my norm (I like oversized on everything practically lol). If you want a more fitted look, def size down. The quality is amazing. Worth the cost. Also- I wish we could reply to reviews. Or at least give us a laugh react Amazon! ü§£ some people forget they can literally READ the measurements PRIOR to purchasing. That way you dont have to give a bad review and return it for something basic like "its too long for me" üòêüòÜüòÜ Read more
items.author: kelly

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars It‚Äôs cute but not what expected
items.body: Pic is decieving. I ordered a small n they send a med, too long too big everywhere, from pic I thought it would be shorter but it‚Äôs longer in length. Read more
items.author: Jennifer hlebovy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Unique
items.body: This sweater is very unique and well made. It‚Äôs a thick quality and the white piping gives it a very striking appearance. It fits true to size. Read more
items.author: Tracey

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Feels awesome, fits great!
items.body: This sweater is fantastic. It is so soft. No itch at all. I also ordered the white one. Fits true to size. Absolutely my favorite buy of the season. Do not hesitate. I might buy an extra white one in case mine gets stained. I love it that much‚ù§Ô∏è Read more
items.author: sparky

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful sweater, but tight neck collar
items.body: Loved the feel and style, however, the neck collar was too tight for my taste Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable sweater!
items.body: Adorable sweater! Nice material, decent quality and a good value for the money! I like to layer with a vest for an extra warmth. I plan on ordering another one in another color! Read more
items.author: Missy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good quality and cute
items.body: It was shrink wrapped and left a little of ribbing impressions but they ironed out. Very nice looking. I got the white trimmed in black Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Pink, White, Jungle Green, Beige, Burgundy, Black, Camel, Navy Blue, Light Grey. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
